Follow the below description to execute examples in snippets folder.

  snippets folder contains following examples
  ============================================

  The following example is to be tested on Baremetal: 
  ===================================================
      ble_power_save

  The following examples can be tested on both Baremetal and FreeRTOS: 
  ==================================================================== 
  1.  access_point
  2.  calibration_app
  3.  cloud_apps 
            | -aws_iot
            | -mqtt 
  4.  embedded_mqtt
  5.  enterprise_client
  6.  http_client
  7.  http_otaf
  8.  https_client  
  9.  instant_bgscan
  10.  mqtt_client 
  11. power_save_deep_sleep 
  12. socket_select_app 
  13. station_ping 
  14. tcp_client
  15. tls_client
  16. udp_client 
  17. wifi6_mqtt_twt
  18. wifi6_mimo
  19. wifi6_twt_tcp_client
  20. wlan_rf_test
  21. ble_per
  22. ble_testmodes 
  23. ble_throughput_app 
  24. gatt_long_read 
  25. ble_central 
  26. ble_datalength 
  27. ble_heart_rate_profile 
  28. ble_ibeacon 
  29. ble_longrange_2mbps 
  30. ble_multiconnection_gatt_test 
  31. ble_privacy 
  32. ble_secureconnection 
  33. ble_white_list 
  34. hid_on_gatt
  35. wlan_station_ble_bridge
  36. wlan_station_ble_provisioning
  37. wlan_station_ble_throughput_app
